column4: can someone tell me how to upgrade my kernel from 2.6.12 to 2.6.17?
I installed 7.04 off cd, but i still had to update it

Oh.... wow, i dunno. If I had that answer 6 months ago... I dont think you can run an update without net access... Youd need to download the packages individually and then make a repo and use it to run updates... i think...
